name: Aiden Jackson
review: The safest way to ensure your health in the pandemic is by owning a private car.

name: Brent Stanley
review: Relying on others for travel or using public vehicles could be detrimental.

name: Jonathan Russell
review: When you own a car, one of the benefits is privacy.

name: Daryl Ramos
review: Public transport and relying on others puts you in the hands of other drivers.

name: Aiden Sullivan
review: Owning a car can help you save time.

name: Adrian West
review: As our population grows and our cities become more congested, getting a car is only practical.
